Title: Relates to requiring the power authority of the state of New York to post on its website and develop a corresponding mobile application with information on electric vehicle charging stations
Summary: Relates to requiring the power authority of the state of New York to post on its website and develop a corresponding mobile application with information on electric vehicle charging stations; requires the website and mobile application include a map with the addresses of each electric vehicle charging station in the state, whether the charging station is located in a parking lot, parking garage or on a street, whether there are fees required to use a charging station, and whether a charging station is out of service or otherwise unavailable.
LawCode: Amd ยง1005, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the power authority of the state of New York to post on its website and develop a corresponding mobile application with information on electric vehicle charging stations
